title: Why are financials, the first module implemented in many ERP packages? - Quora

response.answer_text: The financial module in any ERP software is essential, Being an integrated system the ERP software must have the basic modules that ease the management task. The financial module in ERP Systems provides financial functionality and analysis reports for ledgers, trial balance data, overall balance sheets, and quarterly financial statements. General features that finance module offers in an ERP system: GENERAL LEDGER.General Ledger is essential both to the financial accounting system and to strategic decision making. 2. ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLES The Accounts receivable Modules helps in tracking all the invoices that is awaiting payment from customers. 3. ACCOUNT PAYABLE Accounts Payable Module (AP) — provides the functionality to enter, monitor, maintain and process for payment of invoices and credit notes, that the organization received from its vendors 4. ASSET ACCOUNTING Fixed asset management like acquisition, depreciation, retirement etcLegal consolidation.A Legal consolidation process is a financial process and allows to show the assets, financial position and income of a group as if the group were a single enterprise 5. Controlling Controlling enables the possibility to plan the financial parameters of the company and offers both proactive capabilities for early warning if they become negative and complex analysis tools to identify factors of influence.
